name: unity-code
description: Unity IDE right inside of Cursor, Windsurf and Trae!

transportId.description: Transport ID for external type resolver

configurationSnippets.label: Attach to Unity Editor with Unity Code

body.name: Attach to Unity Editor with Unity Code

unity-code.autoRefreshAssetDatabase.description: Enable/disable automatic Unity asset database refresh when assets are saved or scripts are created/deleted, this will be automatically disabled if Hot Reload for Unity is running

unity-code.debugger.stepOverPropertiesAn.description: Step over properties and operators when debugging Unity code

unity-code.ignoreDuplicateLogs.description: Ignore duplicate logs in Unity Console (logs with exactly the same content including stack trace)

unity-code.assetDatabaseRefreshDelay.description: Minimum delay in seconds between Unity asset database refreshes to prevent overwhelming Unity Editor with frequent refresh requests (1-60 seconds)

scripts.test: npm run compile && npx mocha out/test/suite/*.test.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsx scripts/build.ts
scripts.build:win: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts win_x64
scripts.build:winarm: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts win_arm64
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts linux_x64
scripts.build:linuxarm: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts linux_arm64
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts mac_x64
scripts.build:macarm: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts mac_arm64
scripts.publish:win: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts win_x64 --publish-open-vsx
scripts.publish:winarm: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts win_arm64 --publish-open-vsx
scripts.publish:linux: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts linux_x64 --publish-open-vsx
scripts.publish:linuxarm: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts linux_arm64 --publish-open-vsx
scripts.publish:mac: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts mac_x64 --publish-open-vsx
scripts.publish:macarm: npm run build && npx tsx scripts/package.ts mac_arm64 --publish-open-vsx
